summary: Sulfuric acid (H2SO4) is a strong, colorless, and odorless liquid. It is made of sulfur, oxygen, and hydrogen. This acid is very important in industry and is used to make fertilizers, process minerals, and refine oil. It can be dangerous, causing severe burns, so it is handled with care. Sulfuric acid is produced by mixing sulfur trioxide with water and there are several methods for its large-scale production.
title: Sulfuric acid
